name: Ghosts of the Sky
description:
A weird little film I made with/for my Dad on Fathers Day, September 2021 (NZ and Australia). Using some of his drone king music, some photos of what remains of my childhood toys and a bit of "movie magic"; Ghosts of the sky is an odd dedication to all the Dads and their offspring who may be separated in these times, or by time itself.. 
Visuals by me, AnalogueI_O and audio by me Dad, RSTsound.
2021.
